mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond}
SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE commodity_name=#{commodityName} AND category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond}
SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond} ORDER BY commodity_totalCount ASC
SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond} ORDER BY commodity_totalCount DESC
SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond} ORDER BY commodity_retail_price
SELECT * FROM t_commodity WHERE category_first=#{categoryFirst} AND category_second=#{categorySecond} ORDER BY commodity_retail_price DESC
SELECT picture_address,picture_is_fist_pictuer FROM t_commodity_pic WHERE commodity_id=#{commodityId}

SELECT t_customer.customer_id,t_customer.customer_name,t_shop.gmt_create,t_commodity.commodity_retail_price,t_shop.shop_number,t_shop.version FROM t_commodity JOIN t_shop ON t_commodity.commodity_id=t_shop.commodity_id JOIN t_customer ON t_shop.customer_id=t_customer.customer_id WHERE t_commodity.commodity_id=#{commodityId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_collect WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} AND commodity_id=#{commodityId}
mapper.select: SELECT commodity_price FROM t_order_detail WHERE commodity_id=#{commodityId}

SELECT t_commodity.commodity_id,t_collect.customer_id,t_commodity.commodity_first_picture, t_commodity.commodity_name,t_commodity.commodity_retail_price FROM t_commodity JOIN t_collect ON t_commodity.commodity_id=t_collect.commodity_id WHERE t_collect.customer_id=#{customerId}
